ags:resource.dc:title: Understanding pelagic stingray (Pteroplatytrygon violacea) by-catch by Spanish longliners from the Mediterranean Sea
ags:resource.dc:subject: Catch/effort, Least squares method, Abundance, Long lining, Swordfish.
ags:resource.dc:description: A General Linear Modeling (GLM) approach to analysis of variance was used to analyze swordfish logged catch rates in number of fish from 24 , 239 trips carried out by the Spanish surface longline fleet addressed to this species in the Western Mediterranean for the period 1988 - 2013.
ags:resource.dc:identifier: ICCAT Collective Volume of Scientific Papers, 0. 2014: 0-0
